## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the benefit it would provide.

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or features?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Implementation Complexity
- [ ] Low (config change, documentation update)
- [ ] Medium (script modification, new documentation)
- [ ] High (kernel modification, extensive testing required)

## Maintenance Note
> ⚠️ **Note**: This project is not actively maintained. Feature requests are welcome but may not be implemented by the original author. Consider submitting a pull request if you'd like to implement this yourself!
